trans-unit.source:
\n

The Encoding in which the output is written.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Asynchronously clears all buffers for the current writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a string containing the characters written to the current StringWriter so far.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx $xxxxxx$XxxxxxXxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string containing the characters written to the current StringWriter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx $xxxxxx$XxxxxxXxxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a subarray of characters to the string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The character array to write data from.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The position in the buffer at which to start reading data.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum number of characters to write.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a string to the current string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a character to the string asynchronously.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The character to write to the string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a subarray of characters to the string asynchronously.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The character array to write data from.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The position in the buffer at which to start reading data.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum number of characters to write.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index plus count is greater than the buffer length.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a string to the current string asynchronously.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
If value is null, nothing is written to the text stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a character followed by a line terminator asynchronously to the string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The character to write to the string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a subarray of characters followed by a line terminator asynchronously to the string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The character array to write data from.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The position in the buffer at which to start reading data.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The maximum number of characters to write.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The index plus count is greater than the buffer length.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes a string followed by a line terminator asynchronously to the current string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
If the value is null, only a line terminator is written.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The string writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.
